files have three sets of permissions. For the user, for the group the files are assigned to, and for other users of the system. To change permissions to the files, you use chmod. "man chmod" in a terminal can tell you how to use the command. http://zernike.uwinnipeg.ca/~s_liao/Courses/2941/Week05.pdf to learn a bit about files from my prof.'s notes.
